action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hunter makes three attacks, using Shortsword or Longbow in any combination.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: {@actTrigger} The hunter is hit by an attack roll. {@actResponse} The hunter halves the damage (round down) it takes from that attack.
